text:
This is an instant product that's mostly cream and sugar. Yes I can taste the hazelnut, but smell it more than taste it. A small cup is way too sweet and the larger cup is weak. It's so sticky sweet that I run a large cup of water through my maker to make sure it doesn't clog my machine up. If you like the instant stuff you get from a machine at a convenience store then this is for you.

Grove Square Cappuccino Cups, Hazelnut, Single Serve Cup for Keurig K-Cup Brewers, 24-Count
